alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 10:55AM EST until January 13 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow and sleet accumulations between 3 and 5 inches for a storm total of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Aroostook, Northwest Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis, and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
